panels.title: Java - % of time spent in GC

panels.description: Excludes 404 and 401, since these error codes are caused by client behaviour and are overrepresented in the data.

targets.expr: (increase(http_server_error_count_total_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) - increase(http_server_error_count_404_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) - increase(http_server_error_count_401_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval])) / (increase(http_server_success_count_total_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) + increase(http_server_error_count_total_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) - increase(http_server_error_count_404_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) - increase(http_server_error_count_401_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]))

panels.title: HTTP Request Error Rate

targets.expr: (increase(http_server_error_count_total_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) - increase(http_server_error_count_404_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) - increase(http_server_error_count_401_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval])) / (increase(http_server_success_count_total_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) + increase(http_server_error_count_total_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) - increase(http_server_error_count_404_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]) - increase(http_server_error_count_401_total{instance="$instance", replica="$replica"}[$__interval]))
